overview: "Knife-like, Flower-like, Like Nothing at All in the World" - William Saroyan  An animated abstract-narrative set to a lush full orchestra composition by Duncan Thum (also entitled "Blue").  While a man's past experience needs to be surgically removed,  somewhere a woman takes bath and contemplates delicate & pleasurable kinds of pain...  Tis all Blue.  Short animated film by Daniela Sherer. Featured in the Animation Show of Shows
title: Blue
